page.title: 16Yeovilton Village
page.content: I live in{Yeovilton village,}about 2 miles from Ilchester and 5from Yeovil. We have{no school}in the village so I go on a special school bus to the nearest one at Ilchester. Yeovilton has about{30 houses,}most of them quite new, surrounded by fields.We have a{farmhouse,}a{nursery for plants,an{airfield}right next to us,a{manmade weir}on the river and lots of trees.We have{no shops. A 'B' road runs through the village.We also have St. Bartholomew's{church surrounded by a graveyard..We have{no {bus service}or any other form of public transport. It is a very quiet village but I like it very much. The noise of the {aeroplanes}is so habitual that I have become used to it; so much so that I don't consciously hear it any more!
